content.description: Figure 1. Protein synthesis in a prokaryotic cell
content.question: Which of the following best describes a characteristic of the process shown in Figure 1 that is unique to prokaryotes?

choices.label: The <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is synthesized in a <math alttext="5 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>′</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="3 prime" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>′</mo></mrow></mstyle></math> direction.

A single strand of the <math alttext="D N A" overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> is being used as a template for the transcription of the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math>.

The translation of the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is occurring while the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is still being transcribed.

The enzyme that is transcribing the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is <math alttext="R N A " overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>RNA</mtext></mrow></math> polymerase.

content.answer: The translation of the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is occurring while the <math alttext="m R N A" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>mRNA</mtext></mrow></math> is still being transcribed.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
